title: Constructivist-Based Child and Adolescent Care Education Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Program combining self-directed learning and face-to-face collaboration in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze problems occurring in care settings and design practical solutions using a constructivist approach.
Participants can evaluate existing care practices and propose improvement directions through reflective practice.
Trainees can develop context-specific care strategies based on peer feedback and apply them to real-world cases.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
